name: iCannPay for WooCommerce
author: ArtisanMarkets Limited

sections.description:
Just started your new online business and have been asked to sign a personal guarantee? Has your business been classified as “high-risk”? Startup businesses and high-risk merchants can now easily accept Visa and Mastercard credit card payments on your wordpress site using iCannPay.

We accept merchants that fall into the following high risk categories:
* Adult Websites/Products
* Dating
* Debt Collection
* e-Cigarettes & Vaporizers
* Furniture Stores
* Multi-Level Marketing
* Nutraceuticals & Supplements
* Paraphernalia
* Time Shares
* and many more…

All you need is this plugin and an iCannPay Merchant Account.
No set-up fees. No commitment. Simple application. What are you waiting for?
Start selling today!

Click Here to Sign Up!
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the WooCommerce->Settings->Checkout->iCannPay screen to configure the plugin
  4. iCannPay comes preinstalled with demo credentials
  5. Make sure iCannPAY is enabled and you’ve disabled all other payment methods for your tests as well as making sure iCannPAY is in the first position on the Gateway Display Order under the Checkout Option
sections.faq:
How can I test a transaction?

Use the following demo credit card numbers for your test;

* Card Number: 4111-1111-1111-1111

* Expiration: Anything in the Future

* CVV2: 123

Then, you can check your test transactions at;

* https://pay.icannpay.com/pay

* UserID: demo@icannpay.com

* Password: demo123

How can I get LIVE credentials to make real world transactions?

Click Here to Sign Up!
